statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT source_name, consumption_kWh FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT building_id, AVG(consumption_kWh) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT building_id, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 GROUP BY building_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption_kWh > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT source_name, SUM(consumption_kWh) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY source_name;
SELECT source_name, AVG(consumption_kWh) AS avg_consumption, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 3 GROUP BY source_name;
SELECT DISTINCT source_name, sensor_id FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE source_name LIKE 'Solar%' ORDER BY consumption_kWh DESC, date ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_sources;
SELECT source_id, location FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Renewable';
SELECT consumption_id, date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources WHERE location = 'California' AND source_type = 'Solar';
SELECT source_name, location, energy_consumed FROM energy_sources JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_sources.source_id = energy_consumption.source_id WHERE energy_consumed > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_sources ORDER BY source_name ASC, source_type DESC
SELECT source_name, location FROM energy_sources WHERE location='USA'
SELECT source_type, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_consumed FROM energy_sources JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_sources.source_id = energy_consumption.source_id GROUP BY source_type
SELECT source_name, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption JOIN energy_sources ON energy_consumption.source_id = energy_sources.source_id WHERE date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT source_name, location, energy_consumed FROM energy_sources LEFT JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_sources.source_id = energy_consumption.source_id ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT source_name, consumption_value FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY consumption_value DESC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM energy_sources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM energy_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_id, MAX(consumption_value) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY source_id;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption_value > 100 ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT source_name, location FROM energy_sources WHERE source_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND location LIKE '%California%'
SELECT source_name, total_consumption FROM energy_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT source_name, consumption_value FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE source_name LIKE '%solar%' OR source_name LIKE '%wind%'
SELECT * FROM energy_reports WHERE total_consumption > 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT id, consumption_value, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE source_id = 3;
SELECT source_name, region, capacity FROM energy_sources ORDER BY region ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_content FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT MAX(capacity) AS max_capacity FROM energy_sources;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_name, region, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT insight_description FROM insights WHERE LENGTH(insight_description) > 100;
SELECT ec.id, es.source_name, ec.timestamp, ec.consumption_value FROM energy_consumption_data ec JOIN energy_sources es ON ec.source_id = es.source_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT source_id, consumption_value FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE consumption_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergySources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT source_name, region FROM EnergySources WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT report_name, total_consumption FROM EnergyReports WHERE total_consumption < 500;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE id = 1
SELECT source_name, region FROM EnergySources ORDER BY source_name ASC
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM EnergyReports WHERE total_consumption > 10000 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT insight_text FROM EnergyReports R JOIN EnergyInsights I ON R.report_id = I.report_id WHERE R.total_consumption < 5000

SELECT E.source_name, R.report_name FROM EnergySources E JOIN EnergySourcesMapping M ON E.source_id = M.source_id JOIN EnergyReports R ON M.report_id = R.report_id WHERE R.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
